name: Bar Brawl (tyhal)
description:
1. You start in a bar
2. Stop the red guys from killing everyone
3. Some will follow you, use them as meat shields
4. Buy and drink beer for the highscore
5. Right click to shoot a potato
6. Left click to move your player
GOAL. Defend the barkeeper
The enemies will keep spawning larger waves until it gets out of control

Made during: 48 Hour GMTK Game Jam 2020

Art Assets: https://www.humblebundle.com/software/rpg-game-dev-bundle

Music: www.bensound.com
